title: Research LLMs for topic sizing for MTN
description: Similar to this [ticket](https://linear.app/intent-hq/issue/FWD-52/research-external-data-sources-to-use-for-topic-sizing) for Verizon, we will use 5 LLMs to generate sizes for  [191 topics](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1xezqoUHgNI2yqNvd4o_N1vyC-a7pVlE3rxDjLf8LOJU/edit?gid=723602819#gid=723602819), and compare sizes from these 5 LLMs and analyze the data sources.
